DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to compare the efficacy and safety of FOLFIRI regimen with irinotecan monodrug in the treatment of advanced colorectal cancer patients in the second-line setting.
DOC.brief_title: FOLFIRI Versus Irinotecan as Second-line Treatment in Metastatic Colorectal Cancer Patients
